sentences.english: Objective To observe the distribution of the neuropeptides in mouse sublingual gland.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察小鼠舌下腺内神经肽的分布。

sentences.english: C has no therapeutic action on AA mouse.
sentences.chinese: 菝葜提取物C组分对AA小鼠没有治疗作用。

sentences.english: In addition, rutin had the effect of raising the platelet count.
sentences.chinese: 另外，芦丁具有增加小鼠血小板总数的作用。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the inhibitory mechanism of Imatinib mesylate on pulmonary fibrosis induced by bleomycin in mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨格列卫对小鼠肺纤维化的干预机制。

sentences.english: Methods Bone Marrow Micronuclei (BMM) assay in mice was used.
sentences.chinese: 方法小鼠骨髓微核试验。

sentences.english: Objective To study the changes of somatostatin in uterus and blood of mouse during genesis cycle.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究小鼠生殖周期子宫和血生长抑素的变化。

sentences.english: Objective: To study the damage effect of inhalation carbon disulfide on immunological cells of mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨二硫化碳染毒对小鼠心肌细胞凋亡的影响。

sentences.english: Studied the antisenility effect of liquorice flavone on mice.
sentences.chinese: 研究了甘草黄酮对小鼠的抗衰老作用。

sentences.english: The accuracy of ELISA was compared with the traditional mouse bioassay system.
sentences.chinese: 用传统的小鼠生物试验比较了方法的准确性。

sentences.english: After inoculation with P. yoelii, parasites disappeared naturally, but with P. berghei…
sentences.chinese: 但接种伯氏疟原虫后的阳性小鼠则不能自然转阴。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of marine algal polysaccharide on immune function of irradiated mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察海藻多糖对辐射损伤小鼠免疫功能的影响。

sentences.english: The research team carried out tests on 24 rats with pre-cancerous tumours in laboratory conditions.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员用24只小鼠进行了试验。

sentences.english: In addition, the knockout mice might be useful as models to study mania.
sentences.chinese: 另外，该基因敲除小鼠可以作为研究躁狂症的模型。

sentences.english: Diabetic mouse models were established by intravenous injection of alloxan tetrahydrate.
sentences.chinese: 四氧嘧啶尾静脉注射制作糖尿病小鼠模型。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the effects of saponins of Panax japonicus on tumor model mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究竹节参总皂苷对小鼠肿瘤模型的影响。

sentences.english: The Liganshu granules have the preventive effect on immune liver injury in mice.
sentences.chinese: 利肝舒冲剂对小鼠免疫性肝损伤有预防作用。

definition: rhesus macaque (Macaca mulatta)/rhesus monkey/lit. river Ganges monkey of north India
